snippet: As long as bond yields are so low, Seth J. Masters, of Bernstein Global Wealth Management, continues to predict the Dow will hit 20,000 by 2020.
abstract: Jeff Sommer Strategies column notes that Seth J Masters, chief investment officer of Bernstein Global Wealth Management, continues to predict the Dow Jones industrial average will reach 20,000 by 2020; says that after months of soaring prices, new stock market records and minuscule bond yields, it may even be the Wall Street consensus.
lead_paragraph: As long as bond yields are so low, Seth J. Masters, of Bernstein Global Wealth Management, continues to predict the Dow will hit 20,000 by 2020.

headline.print_headline: No Retreat On a Forecast For the Dow
headline.seo: Forecast for a 20,000 Dow Still Holds
headline.main: Forecast for a 20,000 Dow Still Holds
